Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Mummy mask
Description: Miniature funerary mask. One face is flat while the other shows the facial features in relief (eyes, nose, lips, chin).  The section with the right eye and that with the lower part of the nose have been glued back in place. These masks were placed on the mummy's face.
